name: Dreamy Apocalypse
description:
Aliens have invaded the world. The only way to survive this invasion is to destroy their planet. And you're the only one who can do it

Epic MegaJam 2022 contest
A game made by HaN Studio for.

Developer: Oğuzhan Altunışık
